application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Information Regularization with Partially Labeled Data

analytic.title: Information Regularization with Partially Labeled Data

abstract.p: Classification with partially labeled data requires using a large number of unlabeled examples (or an estimated marginal P (x)), to further constrain the conditional P (y|x) beyond a few available labeled examples. We formulate a regularization approach to linking the marginal and the conditional in a general way. The regularization penalty measures the information that is implied about the labels over covering regions. No parametric assumptions are required and the approach remains tractable even for continuous marginal densities P (x). We develop algorithms for solving the regularization problem for finite covers, establish a limiting differential equation, and exemplify the behavior of the new regulariza-tion approach in simple cases.
